title: cmd/ld: closure variables are missing type information for gdb
body:
a closure reference to a variable foo shows up as a parameter named &foo to the
closure, but http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/cmd/ld/dwarf.c#1997 fails to
find a gotype for it, so the DWARF describes it as 'type unspecified',  and gdb thinks
it's of type 'void'.
